statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT feedback_id, rating, date_submitted FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC
SELECT customer_name, feedback FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating = 5
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE date_submitted >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM CustomerFeedback
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM tourist_experience WHERE location='Paris';
SELECT experience_name, location FROM tourist_experience ORDER BY experience_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM tourist_experience WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS highest_rating, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback;

SELECT tourist_experience.experience_name, tourist_experience.location, customer_feedback.customer_name FROM tourist_experience JOIN customer_feedback ON tourist_experience.feedback_id = customer_feedback.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedbacks;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, satisfaction_level FROM tourist_experiences WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT issue_description, improvement_plan FROM services_improvement ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tourist_experiences WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedbacks WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%';
SELECT * FROM services_improvement ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT service_id, issue_description, completion_date FROM services_improvement WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedbacks ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_rating > 4.5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT experience_name, location, feedback_id FROM tourism_experiences ORDER BY experience_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_rating FROM services WHERE service_rating >= 4 ORDER BY service_rating DESC;
SELECT experience_name, location, feedback_id, customer_id FROM tourism_experiences WHERE feedback_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY experience_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedbacks WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT service_name, service_description FROM services WHERE service_id = 2;
SELECT experience_name, location, rating FROM experiences ORDER BY rating DESC, location ASC;
